text: Tu ji erebe cole en ku para de hatine hiþtin re beje ku: "Hune bal komeleki zor cengvan ve bene gazi kirin ku hun bi wan re þer bikin yan ji ew seri deynin-musilman bibin, veca eger hun peyrewti bikin we Xuda xelatek rind bide we. Eger cewa ku we bere piþt daye hun piþt bidine we we bi ezabeki bi jan bide ezab dayin
